context: Broadcom Inc. is a semiconductor and infrastructure software conglomerate focused on semiconductors, networking, storage, and enterprise software. Network switching and wireless infrastructure. Data center growth.

competitors.name: Qualcomm
competitors.notes: Leading competitor in wireless/mobile semiconductors, particularly in wireless modems and mobile processors

competitors.name: Intel
competitors.notes: Competed in networking chips, Ethernet controllers, and network interface cards

competitors.name: Texas Instruments
competitors.notes: Competitor in wireless solutions and analog/digital chips for various industries

competitors.name: Marvell Technology
competitors.notes: Direct competitor in networking, storage, and wireless semiconductor solutions

competitors.name: Analog Devices
competitors.notes: Competitor in semiconductor solutions for communications and industrial applications

competitors.name: NXP Semiconductors
competitors.notes: Competed in connectivity solutions and wireless communications

competitors.name: Cisco
competitors.notes: Competed as a customer and competitor in networking infrastructure and chips
